revised_title: A Case Study of Dropsy of the Ovarium and its Treatment
tldr: The article presents a case study of a woman with dropsy of the ovary, where a large amount of water accumulated in her body. The patient underwent numerous treatments, including tapping to remove the water, and lived for 25 years with intervals of ease. The case highlights the role of nature in defending the body from sudden death and providing relief in such conditions.
